1374900.name: Dental Madness: Cavity Mania
1374900.description:
Objective: Become The Ultimate Cavity Destroyer!


Drill through 20 levels of increasingly difficult cavities to become the Ultimate Cavity Destroyer! Fight the clock to earn that sweet dentist salary and earn your place on the high scoreboard.

Locate Cavities With The Dental Mirror

Whether you want to better yourself as a dentist or better your hand-eye coordination with your mouse and keyboard, Dental Madness: Cavity Mania is your game.

Dental Mastery Requires Practice

Keep trying to beat your high score while learning to finesse your drilling skills. Created with full 3D graphics, this first-person medical simulation is sure to entice both casual and hardcore gamers alike.

Drill Away The Cavities!

Key Features:

  • Use dental drill and mirror to eliminate cavity decay!
  • Full 3D Graphics
  • Leaderboards for the fastest time and the most money.
  • Full game tutorial and training.
  • Enjoy listening to an exclusive classic video game inspired soundtrack created by Taras Terletskyy.

highlighted.name: You Beat Dental Madness: Cavity Mania!
